survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employees' digital habits and preferences for workplace digital detox practices to improve well-being and productivity.

questions.question_text: How often do you feel overwhelmed by digital notifications at work?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for better granularity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
